short_summary: department of national defence has a requirement for quantity 1 of submarine battery commissioning kit, to be delivered to victoria, british columbia, canada
description: department of national defence has a requirement for submarine battery commissioning kit. the kit will be used for delivering the battery commissioning kit to victoria, british columbia, canada, and it is subject to the provisions of the comprehensive and progressive agreement for trans-pacific partnership (cptpp), the world trade organization agreement on government procurement (wto-agp),  the canada european union comprehensive economic and trade agreement (ceta), ukraine-canada free trade agreement, peru-canada free trade agreement, chile-canada free trade agreement, colombia-canada free trade agreement, honduras-canada free trade agreement, panama-canada free trade agreement, korea-canada free trade agreement, and the canadian free trade agreement (cfta).
full_summary:
###[RFP] Battery Commissioning Kit for Victoria Class Submarines
####Official Solicitation Reference
* Solicitation Reference Number: WS-40874-16375-Doc-40921-31214
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS-40874-16375

####Important Dates
* Publication Date: 2023-07-19
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-28 14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-02
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A

####Procurement Details
* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Competitive Bid - Open Tendering
* Lowest Price Selection Criteria
* Trade Agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

####Deliverables
* Battery Commissioning Kit (NSN: 6630-12-421-3519)
* Delivery Location: Victoria, British Columbia, Canada
* Delivery Subject to:
	+ CPTPP
	+ WTO-AGP
	+ CETA
	+ CUFTA
	+ CPFTA
	+ CCFTA
	+ ALEC

####Contact Information
* Primary Contact: Walsh, Patrick
* Contact Email: [patrick.walsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.walsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Alternative Contact Method: Consult solicitation documentation for more information.

####Notice URL
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16824193?extsite=MTY4MjQxOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16824193?extsite=MTY4MjQxOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

####Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSP
